artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Scroll-like branches with leaves. Olive, red, amber Amber
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc.%2C Larsen Design Studio
text: Mimosa was inspired by a Japanese carpet housed in the company’s Treasure Room* and is a wonderful illustration of how a textile designer’s skills can be used to successfully integrate many elements to create a fine textile.  The pattern was incorporated into two different cloths, one a rich chenille jacquard upholstery and the other a clipped supplementary weft neutral casement.  The use of materials, color range, structure and intended use of the cloths are entirely different and yet the pattern elements are essentially the same.
title: Mimosa
